channel.title: Movie Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Movie Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Bad Guys 2’ Review: Sam Rockwell, Marc Maron and Awkwafina Return for More Criminally Fun Animated Antics
item.description: Anthony Ramos and Craig Robinson are also back, joined by characters voiced by Danielle Brooks, Maria Bakalova, and Natasha Lyonne, for this ’toon about a group of animal outlaws.

item.title: ‘The Bad Guys 2’ Review: Sam Rockwell, Marc Maron and Awkwafina Return for More Criminally Fun Animated Antics
item.description: Anthony Ramos and Craig Robinson are also back, joined by characters voiced by Danielle Brooks, Maria Bakalova, and Natasha Lyonne, for this ’toon about a group of animal outlaws.

item.title: ‘The Home’ Review: Pete Davidson Headlines Intriguing but Uneven Nursing-Home Horror From ‘The Purge’ Creator
item.description: The comedian stars as a troubled former foster kid who gets a job working at a secret-haunted care center for the elderly.

item.title: ‘The Home’ Review: Pete Davidson Headlines Intriguing but Uneven Nursing-Home Horror From ‘The Purge’ Creator
item.description: The comedian stars as a troubled former foster kid who gets a job working at a secret-haunted care center for the elderly.

item.title: The 25 Best Horror Movies of the 21st Century, Ranked
item.description: From razor-edged satires to dark fairy tales, inspired haunted house riffs and nerve-shredding accounts of supernatural possession, the 2000s have been a goldmine for fright freaks.

item.title: The 25 Best Horror Movies of the 21st Century, Ranked
item.description: From razor-edged satires to dark fairy tales, inspired haunted house riffs and nerve-shredding accounts of supernatural possession, the 2000s have been a goldmine for fright freaks.

item.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Review: Pedro Pascal and Vanessa Kirby Lead Appealing New Crew to Break Marvel Property’s Six-Decade Curse
item.description: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Joseph Quinn and Julia Garner also star in Matt Shakman’s superhero adventure, in which the team must save Earth from a “Devourer of Worlds.”

item.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Review: Pedro Pascal and Vanessa Kirby Lead Appealing New Crew to Break Marvel Property’s Six-Decade Curse
item.description: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Joseph Quinn and Julia Garner also star in Matt Shakman’s superhero adventure, in which the team must save Earth from a “Devourer of Worlds.”

item.title: ‘No Sleep Till’ Review: A Tropical Storm Threatens a Florida Town in a Mesmerizing Debut
item.description: Alexandra Simpson’s film follows a group of coastal residents as they decide whether to stay or leave in light of an approaching hurricane.

item.title: ‘No Sleep Till’ Review: A Tropical Storm Threatens a Florida Town in a Mesmerizing Debut
item.description: Alexandra Simpson’s film follows a group of coastal residents as they decide whether to stay or leave in light of an approaching hurricane.

item.title: ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’ Review: Freddie Prinze Jr. and Jennifer Love Hewitt Return for a Legacy Sequel Not Worth Screaming About
item.description: Madelyn Cline, Chase Sui Wonders, Jonah Hauer-King, Tyriq Withers and Sarah Pidgeon also star in Jennifer Kaytin Robinson’s film, set three decades after the 1997 original.

item.title: ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’ Review: Freddie Prinze Jr. and Jennifer Love Hewitt Return for a Legacy Sequel Not Worth Screaming About
item.description: Madelyn Cline, Chase Sui Wonders, Jonah Hauer-King, Tyriq Withers and Sarah Pidgeon also star in Jennifer Kaytin Robinson’s film, set three decades after the 1997 original.

item.title: ‘Smurfs’ Review: Rihanna and James Corden Lead All-Star Voice Cast in a Reboot That Chooses Chaos Over Charm
item.description: Nick Offerman, Natasha Lyonne, Sandra Oh, John Goodman, Kurt Russell and Jimmy Kimmel also lend their vocal talent to this new installment of the animated franchise.

item.title: ‘Smurfs’ Review: Rihanna and James Corden Lead All-Star Voice Cast in a Reboot That Chooses Chaos Over Charm
item.description: Nick Offerman, Natasha Lyonne, Sandra Oh, John Goodman, Kurt Russell and Jimmy Kimmel also lend their vocal talent to this new installment of the animated franchise.

item.title: ‘The Scout’ Review: Modest but Accomplished Debut Brings a New York Location Scout’s Routines to Lovely, Low-Key Life
item.description: Paula Andrea González-Nasser’s first film follows a location scout trying to find meaning in her own existence as she slips in and out of people’s homes.

item.title: ‘The Scout’ Review: Modest but Accomplished Debut Brings a New York Location Scout’s Routines to Lovely, Low-Key Life
item.description: Paula Andrea González-Nasser’s first film follows a location scout trying to find meaning in her own existence as she slips in and out of people’s homes.

item.title: ‘GEN_’ Review: A Compassionate Portrait of an Italian Doctor Treating Both Trans Patients and Women Trying to Conceive
item.description: The latest documentary from filmmaker Gianluca Matarrese (‘Everything Must Go’) premiered earlier this year in Sundance and was recently showcased at Karlovy Vary.

item.title: ‘GEN_’ Review: A Compassionate Portrait of an Italian Doctor Treating Both Trans Patients and Women Trying to Conceive
item.description: The latest documentary from filmmaker Gianluca Matarrese (‘Everything Must Go’) premiered earlier this year in Sundance and was recently showcased at Karlovy Vary.
